data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fan, Zhong-Hua, Liu, Guo-Qing (2010): The genus Lelia Walker, 1876, with the Description of One New Species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae). Zootaxa 2512: 56-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196067
